## SummonerSpell.tooltip property

The tooltip of this summoner spell. This does not contain the HTML-like tags to help view this better on console and other output media.

See [rawTooltip](./shieldbow.summonerspell.rawtooltip.md) to view this with the HTML-like tags included.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get tooltip(): string;
```
